website_summaries.verdict: Not only isolates midsection muscle groups, but helps those with back pain.
pros: Effectively and comfortably lifts your lower back, allowing for intense, isometric abdominal movements without added strain to the back
We love that it comes with a free resistance band to enhance the workouts
Current customers appreciate the mat's firmness as well
cons: May take some time to break in

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for  controlled ab work
customer_reviews.text: The abdominal sit up pad works well when you know good body mechanics. I have one in my primary home and one in my snowbird home. I recently had back fusion and have found no matter how strong my abs got I will still use my L3, L4, and L5. This piece of equipment keeps your back from being utilized while your abs tighten up so much you can feel even the smallest of muscle fiber move up and in. I would give a 5 rating however one does slide off the end a bit if wearing yoga pants.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Reduces neck pain and gives a nice stretch too
customer_reviews.text: This pad is awesome. Usually I can't do very many situps because my back and neck start hurting. Using this pad, the only strain is on my abdominal muscles, and my back gets a pleasant little stretch while I'm at it. My kids have very weak cores and can't do sit ups, so their physical therapist had them put a pillow under their backs and they still struggled, but with this pad, my 9 year old daughter can do them without assistance. She feels proud of her accomplishment and is actually doing her exercises more often.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a brick!
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a brick. I understand that ab mats should be firm. We use them in CrossFit all the time. I had knee surgery and couldn’t go to the gym so I figured I could do basic arm and ab workouts so I ordered this to use at home. It’s so hard that it hurts and it slides every where. Literally it’s so hard I couldn’t stand it. Maybe it will break in and be softer but given that I’ll be going back to my gym in 2 to 3 months I don’t have the time to break it in because I won’t really need it much after that. I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good pad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sit up pad overall. It is a little bit firm, but that doesn't bother us. Make sure you have the higher end towards your butt. In other words the "ELITE" words should by under your lower back.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and is portable
customer_reviews.text: For sit-ups I have been using--for want of a better phrase--a rocking frame device. The problem with it is that without folding it, it is awkward to move from room to room. And folding and unfolding this particular device does not work very well. The Elite Sportz Sit-up Pad could not be easier to move, and it works well. Sit-ups and leg lifts (especially with weights strapped to my ankles) can be accomplished with no back strain.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: perfect if you have middle back issues
customer_reviews.text: perfect if you have middle back issues. My chiropractor recommended I get an Ab pad. I never heard of them before. This one had good reviews so figured I would try it. It's well made and amazing solved my issue with v-ups and sit ups. Before it would just kill my back, this took the pessure off the exact area i needed it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: More Effective Abdominal and Oblique Workouts!
customer_reviews.text: This uniquely curved abdominal was a great boost to my training! I’m an accomplished competitive lifter who now uses this to do advanced spread-eagle sit-ups. I also use the mat doing my usual 2,000 crunches a week from a variety of angles including oblique movements. I actually had to cut back a bit on the number the first few times because of how more intense the crunches were. The curvature enables my abs to extend back about another 25-30°, which makes abdominal/oblique work much more effective! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Hardest mat ever! Painful
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on mat! But they are hard as a rock! I tried to do my 100” sit-ups with this mat and I got to 25. My back still hurts from the hard hard mat. I left the mat to my hubby. Didn’t mention anything about it to him Bcz I wanted to see if he’d say the same thing. After a few sit-ups he says the darned thing is harder than a rock! Lol. Sending it back. Too painful.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great pad for ab work
customer_reviews.text: As I start a new exercise routine I wanted a good back pad for my abdominal work. This is a great product that offers nice firm support during sit ups. I have had no back issues since using this in my routines. It is very similiar to the one that I used at the local gym. Great product that will get lots of use at my house.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company, great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are wonderful. The assisted stretch bands are awesome and they are great quality! For those concerned with stiffness, they are not that stiff for one and secondly they break in and soften up the more you use them. I will definitely be buying more. If you are on the fence about them, don't be! You will be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: SO great!!
customer_reviews.text: SO great!!! It is a little dense/ hard which makes it perfect for my handstand pushups . Using the rouge ones, which get really soft overtime, tend to hurt my head. The fact this one holds up better and will seem to hold up longer is awesome. PLUS is so much cheaper than rouge (lets be honest). And my order came with a nifty little stretching band. A cute little perk for my yoga time. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great abdominal sit up mat. Great Price: Easy to use. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: As mention before, I like price and have been using this abdominal mat for sit ups. Works great for my lower back and stores easy. Great traveling partner when traveling. Most hotels do not have a gym and if they do, it is very limit as what you can do. I use my ab mat in my hotel room and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lomai TX

customer_reviews.title: It hurts so good
customer_reviews.text: The ab mat works by lifting your lower back, and putting your pelvis in a more optimal position and blah blah blah. It freaking works!!! I will not work abs anymore without this. It gives the abdominals a full range of motion on the floor. I had a low body fat percentage, but very little abs. This thing made the difference. The shipping was great. It came with that little green thing. I don't know what I'm gonna use it for yet, but I'm sure I'll figure something out.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: I have only used for about two weeks but seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used for about two weeks but seems to work on the abs without hurting the back. Time will tell how effective it will be. I am not sure how durable the mat will be. It is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Greaty product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality abdominal mat I purchased for my wife and I plan to use it as well. I would actually rate the mat and bands a 4.5, but we cannot add to the star options. The only that would make it a 5 for us, would be to add some sort of a mat extension that would go under the tailbone. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Also has a slightly different curve but this seems to work better as it hits the upper abdominals more
customer_reviews.text: Stiffer than an AbMat, but it seems to soften over time. Also has a slightly different curve but this seems to work better as it hits the upper abdominals more.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Makes your boring sit ups even better.
customer_reviews.text: When you do sit ups, a simple ab exercise you wouldnt think much of it until you notice a pinch on your lower back and then it starts to get uncomfortable to where you have to stop because of it. This Elite pad was just exactly what I needed as a beginner to start doing sit ups and even if your a vet it'll help you out in the long run. I'll always be using it to make sure I give my back support because when it comes to exercising if done without proper form you could get injured quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Crossfitter, returned, hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: and thick as a brick! This thing is nothing like the Rogue mats I used for years at crossfit. Its so thick and hard that I couldn't do a standard back on the floor crossfit style sit up without serious back pain. A rogue mat is less than $10 more and I wish I had just ordered that to begin with. Also, this thing moves around a lot under you without a yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: D A

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: It' s a real back saver. My back and neck have been messed up for years from an accident. I can't do much for my neck, but this certainly lets me keep exercising my abs.
customer_reviews.author: I Live Here $

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I own and operate a gym. This little mat gets heavy use, it’s incredibly beneficial for core work, sets perfectly for lumbar support on the decline bench particularly. One of the little gems of my gym, low-cost but extremely useful accessory. Just get one. You need it.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Why spend more when this has the best results for the money spent... Get one, you'll like it for sure...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done with minimal wear and tear dudes. Much safer way to work your abdominals without risking injury to lower back. The extra green rubber elastic strap is frosting on the cake as they say. For under $20 with free shipping this is one the best values for this type of exercise support item. Should last a good long time with proper use.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring Minds

customer_reviews.title: Great product, delivery could've been better
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I had hoped, no complaints, I would repurchase. However, the item arrived and it wasn't in a shipping box, there was just a label stuck on the outside of the product box which showed everyone what was inside. It's the holiday, it could've ruined a gift surprise. it could have also been easily stolen by showing passers by, what the package included. Gratefully it wasn't but hoping this helps the shipper to consider preventable measures going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric Party

customer_reviews.title: I have used the sit up mat multiple times now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the sit up mat multiple times now, and it definitely helps support lower back during sit ups. If you are trying to cycle through a lot of reps of sit ups, an ab mat such as this will help you no doubt. Only con I have with this ab mat, is the fact that the bottom of it is smooth, so if you are working out on a smooth surface, the mat will slide out from underneath you during your sit ups. Other than that, this is a solid product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lower back.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this great for a good a back stretch, it really helps to support my back when doing some ab exercises and I actually Feel it in the abs more than usual. So win win win: good stretching, good support, and more effective workout!
customer_reviews.author: Kathylonergan

customer_reviews.title: One more rep!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. I needed an ab mat for my home gym and went ahead and bought this one. I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend to anyone looking to purchase. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: The Daydreaming Warrior Poet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the ab mat that we use in Crossfit, and it's helping me correct my form and posture while working out at home, too. The online videos/tutorials have been great, too. AND it came with a resistance band to help me progress even further. A great product - I hope to be using it for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Philip V

customer_reviews.title: Firm but Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Note-my rating for pain relief did NOT apply, so disregard the rating. The mat itself was firm. My only issue with this pad- I could not place it on ANY surface without it moving to include a gym mat. This was frustrating and as a result, returned it. It wasn’t worth the time & hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not made for small bodies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat to replace one I had borrowed from my gym. This is way thicker on the tailbone end than I wanted. Instead of making situps more comfortable, this made them worse because it's very firm and not shaped well for my back personally. I am a petite 5'2" woman and this was too thick for me. For one, it means the mat slides away every time I do a sit up, for another it means my shoulder blades can't even touch the ground when I use this. Not made for small bodies!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Physical Ed Teacher Ordered!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where have this been all my adult life? This is just what the physical ed teacher told me I would need if I did not do my sit ups continuously. The Elite Sit-Up Pad is very comfortable and it really helps with suporting the arch of my back as I am doing my sit-ups. Perfect for giving me that support in order to pull my self up without pulling my neck. I can pretty much do my sit ups with my hands across my chest and or while using the rubber stretch band.
customer_reviews.author: Carvella A. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great ab/back pad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my team to use and stretch out on at work. We all love it. It gives the perfect amount of support and stretching, and the from the amount of back pops heard when doing so is much needed. We have people from 5 ft up to 6-1” and can all use it without issue. We use it with the “Elite” wording pointed away from our backs. It also came with a stretchy band, and that’s useful for all kinds of stuff to stretch. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Bushen

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm to Firm I Guess
customer_reviews.text: Maybe needs to be broken in, but this seems to firm/rigid to me compared to those at my gym. Doesn't seem to conform to my back, thus my back is not supported (if that makes sense). Needs to be a little softer to encourage my lower back to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: moves around on the floor too much
customer_reviews.text: I mean it gets the job done, but for crossfitters - it's far too stiff if you're hoping to use it as a head support for things like handstand pushups. And the dang thing moves all over the place when you're trying to do ab mat sit-ups. Would recommend looking for a product that ensures a no-slip bottom. Not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Way to stiff for normal CrossFit type of sit-ups. Also, no rubber backing so it slides around like crazy. There are much better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Dougan

customer_reviews.title: It is great- I am a germ freak and don’t like the idea of using communal items if I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this after starting CrossFit. It is great- I am a germ freak and don’t like the idea of using communal items if I can at all help it. This was very similar to the ones the gym has. Great option!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Morlan

customer_reviews.title: I wish it were more comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: The mat is well made. My only complaint is that it is quite firm, much more so than the Rogue and other brand mats at my CrossFit box. It also feel higher (thicker) but that may just be the increased firmness. I wish it were more comfortable to use, but it is better than a rolled up towel, which is all I had before.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and even better customer service. Mat is stuff and durable but not stiff to the point where it would feel like a rock. Also the resistance band is a hit or miss I didn't get it upon arrival and had to call them to send me one which is exactly what I did. The customer service is great and they sent me the resistance band with out any question. Will defiantly buy again. Also you can't go wrong with their life time warranty for all their products.
customer_reviews.author: william yang

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect product for my sit-ups!
customer_reviews.text: This pad is perfect for doing my sit-ups at home. I do Crossfit, so I wanted what we have at the gym! It’s perfect and very supportive. It may feel to stiff for some people, but it needs to be to support. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Protect that back!`
customer_reviews.text: A 6-pack doesn't look good if you're doubled over in permantent pain. Protect the back! When doing ab excercises I try to use this as much as possible (it doesn't always work with movements that require spine on the mat). This made me feel safer and more supported
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my growing home gym setup. The padding is soft while still being supportive, and the construction is well done. I use it mainly for glute bridges. The price is also extremely reasonable. There really isn't much more to say about this very simple, very useful addition to your home gym. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Concilliator

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. I had used these in a local gym I used to attend. I decided to build a home gym and purchased one of these right away. I use it daily and it helps alleviate discomfort in my back while doing full range sit ups.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Allows for full range while on the ground
customer_reviews.text: The mat does a great job at allowing you to get a full range of motion for each sit up. Really allows for opening of the abdominals while laying on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with back issues
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT! I have back problems, and recently had a ALIF surgery in my lower back. I have been slowly rebuilding my core muscles, and it was hard to to crunches or stretches without any support. This really helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones in CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: Now that I am only working out at home I had to have this for situps. It really keeps your back from straining. Sometimes I just rest on it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this some time ago and I have used it quite a bit. I was introduced to this product in a cross fit class I took and noticed a significant difference with my sit ups. This came a bit more firm than the one I used in the class, but overall it is very high quality and useful. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Must for back support
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I had back surgery and didn't think I'd ever do crunches or sit ups again but with this pad I can do both worry free!! I also use it when benching for added support
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Supports my lower back properly, and I get good isolation as well. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Williams

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the ab mat it is what I am used to using and works great. However, it kind of smells like it was in someone's basement for a few years before shipping it to me. Not sure why because it was wrapped in plastic and in the original box. I can't get rid of the smell either, I keep spraying it with air freshener and leaving outside to get some air.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: This pad is great for crunches tho for leg lifts
customer_reviews.text: I use the pad on a yoga mat which prevents it from slipping and it is a little firmer than I thought it would be. I have an exaggerated arch in my lower back making any ab exercises difficult to do. This pad is great for crunches tho for leg lifts, I still need to put my hands under my rear end for support. Hopefully with continued use, my abs will get stronger and the pad alone will be sufficient!
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me in good functional form
customer_reviews.text: It does help me in my situps. I am 84 years old and recovering from a fractured femur and hip six months ago. The abdominal sit up pad allows me to quite easily do the situps - and most importantly maintains good form. Without it I am twisting and could easily do harm.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: I have used other ones (dif brands) and they supported me. This one didnt suppirt me...rather it felt awkward and hurt tye longer i used it. I ended up just using a yoga mat
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, but can't say it feels like the right size.  seems too long for people under 7ft tall.
customer_reviews.text: it works pretty good, but can't say it feels like the right size. it seems too long for people under 7ft tall.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it will last a lifetime. Hopefully I’m right. Looks really well made. I’m impressed. Or maybe I had low expectations due to the quality of the ones at my gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Glad i purchased the elite sportz abdominal. Have worked at ups for 27 years and have lower back issues. I wanted to do sit up's but my lower back would hurt after a few sets. With the elite sportz abdominal i have not had any issues with lower back pain when doing sit up's. Thx and i also use it a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Mr brown

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for very flexible people!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is really hard. It might be ok for very flexible people, but if you are average, this might not be the one you are looking for. The foam inside is very rigid.
customer_reviews.author: JO Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, great price and fast shipping and processing..
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly so I give them 5/5 for shipping and processing. The product is fantastic and it has great build quality. Very comfortable as well compared to other units I've used it's also very sturdy so for overall performance and quality I am gonna have to say 5/5 for build quality and performance...
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Too hard!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't feel right when using--sticks up too high in your back. Needs to be a bit softer. The Abmat brand has a sense of memory foam that somewhat deflates but supports your back at the same time allowing better isolation for your abs. Thought I could get away with a comparable brand but that's my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: palooza

customer_reviews.title: Essential gym equipment
customer_reviews.text: Takes the pressure of your neck/back and extends your range of motion. Situps until failure on this is the perfect finisher to a workout
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Gives great support.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Doing sit-ups is hard for me. It is very rough on my lower back. This pad has helped me greatly. I have not had any back pain while doing sit-ups since using it. The padding is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed in this simple
customer_reviews.text: After using this very Abdominal pad at the Pilates Studio I work out at, I ordered one for my home. You won't be disappointed in this simple, but very effective pad for doing Ab workouts. They even included a green band for workouts! I will definitely be ordering more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy life

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and bonus resistance band
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Elite Abdominal sit-up pad because we use the same one in the Crossfit Gym I belong to. The pad is perfect, arrived on time, and came with a resistance band that was a pleasant surprise! I highly recommend this Elite Abdominal Sit-up pad for anyone that wants to create a little at home gym for the days when you can't quite make it to the real gym. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tenicia Helmberger

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Hard Padding
customer_reviews.text: The reviews saying that this is very hard were correct. I have multiple authentic AbMats that I use at my gym, and this is much harder. Some people don't mind how hard the pad is, however many do not like the difference. Putting that aside, the construction is good over all and size is nearly identical to the AbMat.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Van Dusen

customer_reviews.title: Like a mat shaped brick
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the negative reviews. The positive reviews are complete fabrications. It's the worst mat I've ever had the displeasure of using.
customer_reviews.author: MStewart

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use an ab mat at the gym so I wanted to add one at home as well. This is working well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: sit up helper
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I am getting back into working out and this is a great back saver.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy F

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that is well- priced. I found the videos that were recommended very helpful, since I was unfamiliar with proper use of the sit up pad. The pad stayed in place during use. The support is firm and supportive. The included exercise band is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Abdominal Workout!
customer_reviews.text: I started using one of these at my gym and wanted one of my own at home to use. Great piece of equipment and can't beat the price. Protects your back while keeping your body in the correct position/alignment to complete sit-ups effectively. I definitely get more of an ab workout with this pad while keeping my back and neck from straining.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice ab mat. Very sturdy and dense. I don't use it much for sit-ups, but I do use it to put my knee on instead of the floor when I'm doing some stretches with the resistance bands. It holds up well in the heat of the gym and the lettering hasn't come off of it. Nice velcro closure on the back. Lightweight. Free resistance band is a plus! Price is great for a quality mat.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Very firm pad...
customer_reviews.text: This abdominal pad is super hard and just adds more pain to my sacral/coccyx area. But I’m able to do a sit up with is so it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kwong

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, initially I did not get the need for a pad to do ab work but after using it.....I totally get and feel it now. It does make a difference and this particular pad is solid. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: DOC

customer_reviews.title: Well Made! Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Helpful for back pain. Good Product! Comes with a resistance band!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: big guy and the pad supports me just fine and is well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tall, big guy and the pad supports me just fine and is well constructed. I wish the base had something that allows it to stick better and not slide on my back so much while its on the floor (carpet). I'm thinking of gluing some rubber to the bottom to keep it from sliding. Maybe I'll use the included stretch band.
customer_reviews.author: Critique Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great But....
customer_reviews.text: Great hight Comfort But unstable if they put something with more grip under.... It’a a Five Stars
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sebastien Zankel

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product in a new cross fit class that I’m taking. I just love it. It makes doing sit ups much more comfortable and productive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as the ones I use at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much identical to what they use at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Gina P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Tried it at CrossFit and then bought one for home. Makes is easier/ no lower back strain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had as rock
customer_reviews.text: no give at all in the body of the matt - very firm - too firm :(
customer_reviews.author: KevnBee

customer_reviews.title: Good ab mat though did not receive web link
customer_reviews.text: Helpful to give lower back support and still get ab workout. However I did not receive web link to video as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kara E. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Good material, well built. My only complaint is that it’s very firm. I’m sure it will break in though
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I have noticed a difference since using this mat. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a difference since using this mat. I definitely feel more of a burn in my various abdominal muscles compared to before using the mat. It has also helped relieve the discomfort in my back from lying on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schuck

customer_reviews.title: My lower back loves this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't do any crunches or other back-to-floor exercises before I started using this pad. I'm seeing a chiropractor, and am trying to improve my core strength to help my posture. The padding and support that this thing gives has made a huge improvement in the effectiveness of my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: knares13

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sit up mat. These help make sit-ups easier, in that you don’t need a way to keep your feet down. The slight arch of the back gives you enough traction to do sit-ups without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me, sturdy  good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item for me to use without hurting my back. I have a back injury and wasn't able to do even mild sit ups until I bought this. It's solid, made study and works for me I am going to buy another one just to have on hand. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lmeast Slacka

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product only complaint is the smell it smells like a strong chemical.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID DOWLING

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this abdominal mat. It’s very similar to the one we use in my CrossFit box. It makes sit-ups super easy and anyone can easily do them no matter your fitness level. The resistance band was an extra bonus as well as access to the video tutorials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, but it's too stiff. I'm a past crossfitter middle age woman who just wanted some support for sit-ups. This thing won't allow me to really lay down, making the exercise less effective.
customer_reviews.author: Musicmom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Easily save ten dollars. This is the same exact mat that cost $25 to $40 anywhere else. I thought I would toss the band that came with it bc I have several and just thought it would be a cheap throw away but I actually ended up using the band.
customer_reviews.author: marg

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Well made and provides the back support needed..I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amberer11

customer_reviews.title: We all have abs!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this pad, I didn’t think I had abs. After I bought this pad, I found out my abs exist and can get sore...they’re just keeping warm in my pizza belly.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son to use and he seems to like it as well
customer_reviews.text: I used this once so far. It is very firm but I assume will soften up with use. You may prefer a firmer mat though. I bought this for my son to use and he seems to like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Assisting with my soon to be 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love ab mats when doing crunches because it supports your lower back area and this mat did just that. It was stiff enough that it's shape does not conform, but is still comfortable to use. The price point is great as well. Highly recommend if you are attempting to get your summer body back!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Abs-solutely Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Received product earlier than expected. The pad is comfortable during use. It moved a little bit during my exercises, but I was on a slick surface.
customer_reviews.author: m l

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected. Great quality so the needed support for my back is there. Delivery was as promised and item was securely wrapped to avoid damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Niiiiice
customer_reviews.text: I need help not only for my situps, also helps in yoga 😬😬😬 sooooo happy I got it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Saad Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Hard for abs
customer_reviews.text: Very hard and seems uncomfortable for abs for me... not sure if it’s because it is brand new but so far it is very hard!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi L-G

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift for my bestie
customer_reviews.text: My best friend is forever getting injured doing sit ups, its caused by her lower back/tailbone rubbing the ground when she sits up. This support will keep that from happening from now on and she is so happy to have it! <3
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great value, product. Only problem is it will slide out
customer_reviews.author: Chevrev

customer_reviews.title: High hopes, but too hard, and too big.
customer_reviews.text: We are using something similar at the gym, these looked "like" them, but no comparison. The one I received seemed to be rock hard and was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: TechDealShopper

customer_reviews.title: This mat is just as good as the more expensive AbMats I've seen and used
customer_reviews.text: This mat is just as good as the more expensive AbMats I've seen and used. It's firm and super supportive for sit ups. I also use it for handstand pushups to cushion my head as I come down - works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The arch is flat and doesn't give full range of motion and feels like you aren't using anything. But the padding is firm. Would work great if the arch wasn't so flat.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

product_meta.title: Elite Sportz Abdominal Sit Up Pad and Gives Great Lower Back Support, Helping to Remove All The Strain, Making Sit Ups Easy - Bonus Resistance Band Included
product_meta.description:
The Elite Abdominal Sit Up Mat is made of high quality material, long lasting and is a very comfortable sit up pad. 
Our sit up mat will quickly give you a direct burn to your Abs, while supporting your lower back as your perform fuller extended sit-ups. 

Dimensions of the Abdominal Exercise Mat are as follows: 14.5 inches x 12 inches x 3 inches wide. 

Elite Sportz Equipment Abdominal Mat is designed to be :

- MORE SUPPORTIVE. We use the best grade of high-density foam to ensure that our abdominal mat is strong and sturdy.
- MADE TO SUIT YOUR SPINAL CURVES. The unique shape of our ab wedge provides the ideal level of support along every inch of your spine.
- MORE COMPLETE. You get a free resistance band with our abdominal mat, so you can fully work your abs!
- SIMPLER TO USE. Our how-to videos will help you to get the most out of your new abdominal mat and resistance band.

Online videos on how to best use your Abdominal mat are provided by Elite Sportz Equipment. The link is on the packaging and instructions. 

Elite Sportz Equipment has a 100% Satisfaction and Replacement Warranty.
In the event of your product ever breaking or your not happy with your purchase please contact Elite Sportz through your order so we will assist you immediately
feature_bullets: WELL MADE and EXACTLY WHAT YOUR'E LOOKING FOR, our sit up mat is high quality, works great and you'll find the back support is exactly what you were looking for in a sit up pad
WORKS GREAT IN MAKING SIT UPS MORE COMFORTABLE, not too hard, not too soft, this great sit up mat supports your lower back while doing sit ups, reducing strain and without hurting your back

FULL RANGE OF MOTION, FULL BENEFIT FAST, having a great lower back support like ours, means you're seriously targeting those abs, removing all the strain, and most importantly maintaining good form in doing a sit up

LOWER BACK ISSUES and the RIGHT SIT UP EQUIPMENT, even if you have had lower back issues in the past, a well made sit up mat with great lower back support like ours gives you the confidence to continue doing sit ups ACCESS TO INSTRUCTIONAL SIT UP VIDEO TRAINING, we have provided some great “how to videos” on our website (URL on packaging) for those that need some extra instruction.
OUR PROMISE – We stand by and believe in our products! If you have any problems, contact us and we will offer you a full refund or replacement!
